pages.title: Ultimate Enriching Catalyst
pages.text: Resources needed: $(li)[Ultimate Crafting table]$(li2)x22 Blank Ingots$(li2)$(l:waters/water)x4 Aqua Catalyst$(li2)$(l:waters/weak_enriching)x3 Weak Enriching Catalyst$(li2)$(l:waters/strong_enriching)x3 Strong Enriching Catalyst$(li2)x3 Blank Bucket$(li2)$(l:waters/cosmos_enriching)x2 Cosmos Enriching Catalyst$(li2)$(l:waters/undergarden_enriching)x2 Undergarden Enriching Catalyst$(li2)$(l:waters/eroding_water)x2 Eroding Catalyst$(/l)
After crafting, This Catalyst can used to generate Ultimate Enriching Water by Throwing it in Cosmos Enriching Water
